entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:55 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -11.5°C

Visibility: 1.2 km

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
